test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page or a generic logged-out state. The session is terminated.
test_cases.automatable: Yes (via UI automation and session verification)

steps_to_execute: 2.  Initiate logout process (e.g., click logout button).
test_cases.expected_result: Upon reopening the browser, the user is not logged in. The session is terminated.
test_cases.automatable: Yes (using automation and session validation checks after browser restart)
test_cases.scenario_name: Verify Session Termination After Logout and Browser Closure

steps_to_execute: 2.  Attempt to access a protected resource after clicking 'logout'.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the login page, access is denied, and a login is required to access the protected resource.
test_cases.automatable: Yes (after logout, attempt to access a protected page via automation)
test_cases.scenario_name: Verify Access to Protected Resources After Logout

steps_to_execute: 2.  Click the 'logout' button multiple times in quick succession.
test_cases.expected_result: The system handles multiple logout requests gracefully, and the user is logged out only once. No errors occur.
test_cases.automatable: Yes (can be automated using scripting tools to rapidly click the logout button)

steps_to_execute: 3.  Immediately try to log in with the same credentials.
test_cases.expected_result: The user can log in successfully after logging out.
test_cases.automatable: Yes (using UI automation to log in and log out and then immediately log in again)
test_cases.scenario_name: Verify Basic Logout and Login Functionality

steps_to_execute: 3.  Navigate to the original page using the back button.
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the login page or a logged-out state, and cannot access the previously viewed content.
test_cases.automatable: No (Requires manual verification of the browser back button behavior)
test_cases.scenario_name: Verify Back Button Navigation After Logout

user_stories.title: Verify Logout Functionality
user_stories.description: Ensure that the logout process correctly terminates the user's session and redirects them to the appropriate page.
